name: Hoa Hoang Apartment
address: Apartment #4, 11B Nguyen Gia Thieu, Hoan Kiem, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Set in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment is 500 metres from Quan Su Temple. The apartment is 900 metres from Trang Tien Plaza. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

There is a dining area and a kitchen complete with a microwave, a toaster and fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured at Hoa Hoang Apartment.

Ba Dinh Square is 1 km from Hoa Hoang Apartment, while St. Joseph Cathedral is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 22 km from the property.
